thread.title: BRIEF-FDA Accepts Remoxy NDA For Review, Sets PDUFA Date Of Aug 7, 2018

title: BRIEF-FDA Accepts Remoxy NDA For Review, Sets PDUFA Date Of Aug 7, 2018
text: March 1, 2018 / 1:22 PM / in 10 minutes BRIEF-FDA Accepts Remoxy NDA For Review, Sets PDUFA Date Of Aug 7, 2018 Reuters Staff March 1 (Reuters) - Pain Therapeutics Inc: * FDA ACCEPTS REMOXYÂ® NDA FOR REVIEW, SETS PDUFA DATE OF AUGUST 7, 2018 * U.S. FDA DETERMINED THAT A NDA FOR REMOXY ER IS SUFFICIENTLY COMPLETE TO PERMIT A SUBSTANTIVE REVIEW * FDA HAS SET AN ACTION DATE OF AUGUST 7, 2018 UNDER PRESCRIPTION DRUG USER FEE ACT (PDUFA) * PAIN THERAPEUTICS -BELIEVES FDA WILL HOLD AN OPEN ADVISORY COMMITTEE MEETING TO DISCUSS REMOXY ER, ALTHOUGH A DATE HAS NOT YET BEEN DETERMINED.
